moves.2. d4 cxd4 3. c3 d3 4. Nf3 d6 5. Bxd3 Nf: Not a good position for black, I guess. white has four pieces out against 2 for black
moves.6. O-O g6 7. Bg5 Bg7 8. Nbd2 O-O 9. Qc2: joining the rooks and aiming at the king
moves.10. Rfe1 a6 11. Rad1: to occupy the semi open file
moves.14... Qc8: Danger on white kingside (if 15. ... Bxh3 ; 16. gxh3 Qxh3 - menace Ng4 or Qg4+
moves.15. Bf1: To prevent black's attack on the kingside
moves.16... Nc6:
Now, black has a material advantage, white's pawn structure is inferior (the a and c pawns are unsupported), white is a bit stronger in the center but black only needs one move (e5) to regain the control.White pieces are more mobile.
White plan is to exchange the weak c pawn against black stronger d pawn but for that, white has to prevent black to control the center and/or attack on the queenside
moves.17. Rdb1: Menacing b7 and occupying the semi open file b
moves.18. Rec1: to enable the c pawn to advance
moves.18... Be6 19. Qa3: aiming at d6, which will be an important square in a couple of moves (see white's plan on annotation - move 16.)
moves.20... Nd7 21. Bh2: To protect the DSB which will be an important piece and carrying on menacing d6
moves.21... Nde5 22. c4: One tempo, the c pawn has to advance
moves.22... Nxf3+ 23. Nxf3: The knight is as well placed here than on the d2 square
moves.23... Qd7 24. Rcd1: Occuying the semi open file. Having a rook on the c file is not important any longer as the c pawn is not under immediate menace and the white queen will protect it on c5
moves.25. c5: No immediate threat, the priority is advance tne c pawn
moves.25... Qa5 26. Qxa5: Trading the queen, the black knight will be far on side
moves.26... Nxa5 27. cxd6:
White situation is getting better :
material equality, white is more powerfull on the center, both kings are safe (the white king is even a bit safer as black advanced 2 king pawn (g and h)
moves.27... Bxa2: Mistake, beginning a couple of trading moves with black's advantage as result
moves.33... Kg7 34. Ne5: From now on, black tries to get a draw but doesn't succeed
